content: आत्ययिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अत्ययः नाशः प्रयोजनमस्य ठक] {@--1@} Destructive, disastrous. {@--2@} Painful, unpropitious, ill-omened, distressing. {@--3@} Pressing, urgent, emergent, ending quickly, not suffering delay; <ls>Ms. 7. 165</ls>; <ls>H. 3</ls>; <ls>K. 294</ls>; extraordinary, special.
